attributes.action: Make fishermen in the English Channel leave Dolphins alone!
attributes.additional_details:
blueseasprotection.com
Blue Seas Protection is a charity dedicated to ending crime at sea. We have a boat and just need the back up from people of the public to agree that we get on with it.
attributes.background: Dolphins are getting caught on fishing nets and murdered in cold blood in the English channel. This is a horrific crime to the oceans. Please sign so that the charity blue seas protection has the back up to go out under united nation law of the sea to prevent this from happening.

rejection.details:
We understand you are concerned about dolphins in the English Channel but we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what you would like the UK Government or Parliament to do.
